channel.title: CTF-reverse on zeroy's blog

item.title: 攻防世界reverse练习区WP
item.description: 0x00. simple-unpack 使用exeinfope脱壳，拖进IDA shift+F12搜索字符串。 0x01. logmein 反编译得到如下代码： void __fastcall __noreturn main(int a1, char **a2, char **a3) { size_t v3; // rsi int i; // [rsp+3Ch] [rbp-54h] char s[36]; // [rsp+40h] [rbp-50h] BYREF int v6; // [rsp+64h] [rbp-2Ch] __int64 v7; // [rsp+68h] [rbp-28h] char v8[28]; // [rsp+70h] [rbp-20h] BYREF int v9; // [rsp+8Ch] [rbp-4h] v9 = 0; strcpy(v8, ":\"AL_RT^L*.?+6/46"); v7 = 0x65626D61726168LL; v6 = 7; printf("Welcome to the RC3 secure password guesser.
